name: df-cur
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0
body: |- wceq(ccur(c0), cmpt(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), copab(s1, s2, wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)))))
comment: Define the currying of ` F ` , which splits a function of two arguments into a function of the first argument, producing a function over the second argument. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
